thread.title: Laurie Yott
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Laurie Yott

author: Laurie Yott
title: Laurie Yott
text: I have worked with Costa Rican Vacations twice. I highly recommend this travel agency - and specifically Robin Sabine. Robin worked tirelessly to locate, suggest and book wonderful hotels and excursions, and generally to arrange everything to make it a fabulous vacation in Costa Rica, all within our budget. I highly recommend you give Robin a call for help with your next trip to Costa Rica.
